WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue was previously reported in the Issue Tracker and fixed for next version.
WorkItem.Description:
A character file that loaded last weekend, no longer loads this weekend.  There was a message on my desktop version that a new version was "downloaded and installed"  I restarted before ever opening the character file and started Rawr over again.  There was no change in the version number.  4.1.3.0 is the same version I had eariler today.  A second character file gives this error:  No toons I attempt to pull from Battlenet will load.  The bar just spins and never loads.  I've waited as lond as 5 minutes.
 
There is an error in XML document (850, 6).
Instance validation error: 'T11_0' is not a valid value for TierLevels.
 
== Version: 4.1.3.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
There is an error in XML document (1086, 6).
Instance validation error: 'T11_0' is not a valid value for TierLevels.
 
== StackTrace ==
   at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(XmlReader xmlReader, String encodingStyle, Object events)
   at System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.Deserialize(TextReader textReader)
   at Rawr.Character.LoadFromXml(String xml)
 
== These are the Steps that I have tried ==
Uninstall and re-install.
Loading from webpage Directly
Loading even older files leads to many sucessive errors.\
Tried loading fresh from battlenet, but it just hangs with no errors.
WorkItem.Summary: A character file that loaded last weekend, no longer loads this weekend.

Comments.Message: Edited the characters .saved .xml file by searching for the offending line containing  "T11_0"  by removing it I was able to load the character...
